channel.title: Downloading Richscape Client problem
channel.description: [code] ! C:\Documents and Settings\owner\Desktop\RichScapeClient.rar: CRC failed in RichScapeClient\cache\runescape\main_file_cache.dat2. The file is corrupt ! C:\Documents and Settings\owner\Desktop\RichScapeClient.rar: Unexpected end of archive [/code] Thats what happens... when i try to extract it also where can i run this client i cant in the button searched everywhere nothing to run it all the other clients ive used i could find them easily some help please??

item.title: Downloading Richscape Client problem
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

For some reason that happens with firefox and opera, try using IE, even though it sucks.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading Richscape Client problem
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Doesn’t it mean your cache is corrupt?

CRC failed in RichScapeClient\cache\runescape\main_file_cache.dat2. The file is corrupt

You didn’t put this in the RS cache folder did you?

Read full topic
